title: The Call
overview: Conscription day in the Dims. Xal publicly defines his stance toward the Empire.
preconditions: Start of game; tutorial movement complete; player has basic interact/stealth.
branch_2_variables: Morality +1; Reputation.Hasran −1; Reputation.Outcasts +1; SaghirLoyalty +1 (latent sympathy).; Carryover: C/O:Defiant.
branch_2_rewards: XP: small; Materials: ration set. Flags seeded: Obedient or Defiant tone.

title: Saghir’s Rescue
overview: A rat‑blood mage is marked for execution. Do you intervene or obey?
preconditions: After the ‘Baptism by Fire’ skirmish; player has lock-on/dodge basics.
branch_1_variables: Morality +1; SaghirLoyalty +20; Reputation.Hasran −1; Reputation.Outcasts +1.; Unlock: Saghir tertiary kit immediately (Glyph Snap, Ward Pocket baseline).; Carryover: C/O:SaghirEarlyJoin.
branch_2_variables: Morality −1; SaghirLoyalty −5; Reputation.Hasran +1.; Saghir joins later at the Academy with reduced early kit access.; Carryover: C/O:SaghirDelayedJoin.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; Unlock: Saghir kit (timing varies).

title: Temple Defense — Order Choice
overview: Pick which demigod-linked assault to counter first: Dalanthar (Aegis) or Celeste (Pyre).
branch_2_rejoin: Completion of both is required before Q16 Airship Heist; order modifies enemy mixes in the second temple and Siege.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium per temple; Materials: ward shards; vendor stock shifts based on collateral.

title: Spear of Jhordil — Airship Heist
overview: Seize the last Elentian battleship to support the Siege with air routes and artillery.
preconditions: After both temple defenses complete; Act V opener.
branch_2_rejoin: Both converge at Bridge Control → Siege setup.
branch_2_rewards: XP: large; Unlocks: airship traversal and Siege objective variants (evac corridors for Stealth, extra ballistae for Assault).

title: Spy in the Academy — Macha
overview: Expose Macha as a Fomori spy and choose how to leverage her network.
preconditions: Act II Academy hub after orientation.
branch_2_rejoin: Both branches unlock different paths in Outcast Quarter and modify Recon clarity in Act III.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; Faction moves shape patrol heat and vendor pricing.

title: Siege of the Spire (G12 Breach Method)
overview: Defend the city and decide how to resolve the planar breach during the boss fight.
preconditions: After Q15 Celeste & Q16 Airship; Act V.
branch_2_rejoin: Both branches end with Shard‑Tyrant collapse → Ritual Raid opens.
branch_2_rewards: XP: large; Title tint: ‘Savior’ lean vs ‘Void‑Touched’ lean for epilogue.

title: God‑Souled Hunt — Ritual Raid
overview: The cult seeks five god‑souled to evolve the arena. Stop them with rescues or decoys.
branch_2_rewards: XP: large; Reputation deltas based on civilian casualties tracked this chapter.

title: Erik and the Morrigan
overview: A political gambit withholds fleets, leaving Erik to face the Morrigan alone.
preconditions: After Q17 Macha; before Q21 Lake Ambush; Act IV.
branch_2_rejoin: Feeds Q21 Lake Ambush tone and faction presence.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; changes patrol heat and vendor pricing.

title: Catalyst Ambush at the Lake
overview: A planned ambush around a Catalyst threatens Erik’s quint; choose tactics.
preconditions: After Q20; closes Act IV loop before Siege prep.
branch_2_rejoin: Converges into Temple Order if not yet completed, else moves to Siege prep state.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; Materials: field kits; faction perception adjusted.

title: Refugee Priority
overview: Decide relief strategy for the Outcast Quarter during the crisis.
preconditions: During Act IV hub setup; before Siege escalation.
branch_2_rejoin: Impacts Siege spawn weights and vendor stock in the hub.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; unlocks vendors based on outcome.

title: Arena Ethos
overview: Win the arena trial to secure Academy admission; define your public image.
branch_2_rejoin: Both routes lead to Academy Invite with tailored VO lines.
branch_2_rewards: XP: medium; public nickname and initial vendor prices vary.

title: Conduit Decision
overview: Final choice at the ritual conduit; determines ending tint and strong CR swing.
preconditions: Act VI finale after Ritual Raid ‘God‑Souled’.
branch_2_rejoin: Ends Act VI → Epilogue variations (Savior vs Void‑Touched).
branch_2_rewards: XP: boss-tier; tint & VO change for credits stinger.
